pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Arcane StorageThis package is base on [google-cloud-storage](https://pypi.org/project/google-cloud-storage/).## Get Started```shpip install arcane-storage```## Example Usage```pythonfrom arcane import storageclient = storage.Client()blobs = client.list_blobs('bucket-id-here')```or```pythonfrom arcane import storage# Import your configsfrom configure import Configclient = storage.Client.from_service_account_json(Config.KEY, project=Config.GCP_PROJECT)blobs = client.list_blobs('bucket-id-here')```
